Setting up chat messages
The System allows sending notifications via a
chat
.
Sending a chat notification to a System user is configured using the
sendChatMsgToSubject
function along with the appropriate template.
To configure a message template, go to the "Chat notification template" object type registry and create a new instance by clicking the
button in the control panel.
Configuring a "Chat notification template" instance includes specifying the following settings:
Setting
Purpose
Name
Entering the notification template name.
Basic objects type
Selecting a base object type from the dropdown list.
Header template editor
Creating a notification header template using the
editor
tools.
The user can add dynamic data to the header template, sourced from any object type attribute or the result of an algorithm execution, find more details
here
.
Message template editor
Creating a message template using the
editor
tools.
The user can add dynamic data to the message template, sourced from an object type attribute or the result of an algorithm execution, find more details
here
.
